name: Home Rugby Shirt
description: As worn by the players this is a hard wearing, tight fit shirt suitable for athletic figures!

name: Home Match Shorts
description: Also match quality kit, ideal for training or lounging by the beach during the Swedish summer.

name: Players' Polo Shirt
description: Mimicing the design of the rugby shirt but with a looser more comfortable fit.

name: Training Singlet
description: Essential for training on the pitch or in the gym. Get those magnificent guns on display.

name: Beanie Hat
description: Keep your head warm while training in the winter, and most of the rest of the year!

name: Bobble Hat
description: It does everything the beanie does plus it has a bobble.
